mapper.select: SELECT m.`perms` FROM know_pub.sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN know_pub.sys_role r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` LEFT JOIN know_pub.sys_role_menu rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN know_pub.sys_menu m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE user_id = #{userid} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0
